biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Melinda Leigh McGraw (born October 25, 1963) is an American actress. She has starred in movies such as Albino Alligator (1996), Wrongfully Accused (1998), and Nutty Professor II: The Klumps (2000), and is also known for her television performances on The Commish, The X-Files and Mad Men.
name: Melinda McGraw
